name: Trivia Game
about: My very first project as a developer! A single page application made using vanilla HTML, CSS, and jQuery. I know some random trivia, do you??

name: Smite Team Builder
about: Made using Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, and Liquid, this is a fan site to one of my favorite video games, Smite! Here users can make an account (with hashed passwords) and view all playable characters in Smite. Users can edit the default characters, create their own, and form teams to see each team's advantages and disadvantes on the battlefield.

name: Jeopardy!
about: This site was created using React states and the Jeopardy! api. Currently, it pulls random questions and displays the answer after users have had a chance to think of the answer. This site is currently under its 2.0 patch that will allow users to pick their own categories, check back soon for more exciting updates!
